turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. From where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Stone Oven

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would love to order one large pizza. I have a ton of guests.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like on your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would love half pepperoni, half green pepper and onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually can I change my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, instead of pepperoni, can I have sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, so one large pizza, half sausage, half green pepper and onion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much will this cost me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will come out to be 16.99

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! You can just use the account I have there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pizza will be available for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. The receipt will be sent to your phone.
